mapper.select: SELECT t1.* FROM sys_office t1 where t1.type=#{type} and t1.enabled =1
SELECT t1.* FROM sys_office t1,hr_account t3 where t1.enabled=1 and t1.id=t3.office_id and t3.id=#{accountId}

SELECT t1.* FROM sys_office t1,hr_account t3 where t1.enabled=1 and t1.id=t3.office_id and t3.account_id in
#{item}
SELECT t1.* FROM sys_office t1 where t1.parent_ids like CONCAT('%',#{parentId},'%') and t1.enabled =1

select office.* from sys_office office where office.enabled=1
and office.name like CONCAT('%',#{p.name},'%')
and office.parent_id=#{p.parentOfficeId}
order by office.name limit 0,20

select office.* from sys_office office where office.enabled=1
order by office.id

SELECT t1.id,t1.name FROM sys_office t1 WHERE t1.enabled = 1 and t1.id in
#{item}

SELECT t1.* FROM sys_office t1 WHERE t1.enabled=1
AND t1.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{p.name},'%')

SELECT t1.* FROM sys_office t1,sys_office_rule t2 where t1.enabled=1 and t2.enabled=1 and t2.type='business' and t1.office_rule_id=t2.id and (t1.parent_ids like concat(',',#{officeId},',') or t1.id=#{officeId}) and t1.office_rule_id=#{officeRuleId}
